languages.text: {n}Офицер перед вами изысканно откланивается.{/n} "Изволите вызвать сопровождение? По судовому регламенту вам дозволена палубная свита из двоих бойцов".

{n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

languages.text: {n}El oficial que tienes delante te hace una elegante reverencia.{/n} «¿Desea mi{mf|lord|lady} una escolta armada? Según las regulaciones de la nave, tiene derecho a un séquito de hasta dos guerreros».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial que tienes delante te hace una elegante reverencia.{/n} «¿Desea mi{mf|lord|lady} una escolta armada? Según las regulaciones de la nave, tiene derecho a un séquito de hasta dos guerreros».

languages.text: {n}目の前の士官が優雅に一礼する。{/n}「武装した護衛をおつけしましょうか、閣下？船の規則によると、最大二人の戦士を連れて行くことができるそうです」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の士官が洗礼された一礼をする。{/n}「武装した護衛をおつけしましょうか、閣下？船の規則では、最大二人の戦士を連れて行くことができます」
{n}目の前の士官が優雅に一礼する。{/n}「武装した護衛をおつけしましょうか、閣下？船の規則によると、最大二人の戦士を連れて行くことができるそうです」

languages.text: {n}你面前的军官向你优雅地鞠了一躬。{/n}“您需要武装护卫吗，大人？根据舰上的规定，您最多可以雇佣两名战士来当您的护卫。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的军官向你优雅地鞠了一躬。{/n}“您需要武装护卫吗，大人？根据舰上的规定，您最多可以雇佣两名战士来当您的护卫。”

languages.text: {n}L'officier devant vous vous adresse un salut distingué.{/n} « Souhaitez-vous une escorte armée, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Le règlement du bord stipule que vous pouvez être {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'un maximum de deux combattants. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier devant vous vous adresse un salut distingué.{/n} « Souhaitez-vous une escorte armée, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ? Le règlement du bord stipule que vous pouvez être {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'un maximum de deux combattants. »

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier vor dir verneigt sich elegant.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr eine bewaffnete Eskorte bekommen, {mf|Lord|Lady}? Laut Vorschriften des Schiffs steht Euch ein Gefolge von bis zu zwei Kämpfern zu."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier vor dir verneigt sich elegant.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr eine bewaffnete Eskorte bekommen, {mf|Lord|Lady}? Laut Vorschriften des Schiffs steht Euch ein Gefolge von bis zu zwei Kämpfern zu."

languages.text: {n}Önünde duran subay, zarif bir şekilde eğiliyor.{/n} "Yanınıza silahlı bir refakatçi ister miydiniz {mf|lordum|leydim}? Gemi mevzuatı, en fazla iki savaşçıdan oluşan bir maiyet hakkınız olduğunu belirtiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer before you gives a refined bow.{/n} "Would you like to be provided with an armed escort, my {mf|lord|lady}? The ship's regulations state that you are entitled to a retinue of up to two fighters."
